article_title: PARIS TN: Flinn: Experience right recipe for Congress
article_text:
Paris, TN (38242)

Today

Thunderstorms with locally heavy downpours. High around 85F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%..

Tonight

Heavy thunderstorms during the evening will give way to cloudy skies after midnight. Low near 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 2 to 3 inches of rain expected.

article_metadata.author:
BY KEN WALKER

POST-INTELLIGENCER

og.description: George Flinn is a well-known Renaissance man in the Memphis area: a successful radiologist, a former electrical engineer and owner of a chain of radio stations.
